page.title: 01 HOME LIFE
page.content: I LIVE WITH MY MUM,DAD AND BROTHER.I'VE GOT LOTS OF PETS.I GO TO SCHOOL 5 TIMES A WEEK.EVERY DAY MILK AND LETTERS ARE DELIVERED TO THE DOOR.I LIVE IN A SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE WITH A LARGE GARDEN.OUR HOME HAS THE FOLLOWING ROOMS ,DOWNSTAIRS,A SITTING ROOM,DINING ROOM, KITCHEN,LAUNDRY ROOM,CLOAKROOM AND STUDY.UPSTAIRS,WE HAVE 3 BEDROOMS,A BATHROOM AND W.C.WE HAVE GAS CENTRAL HEATING WHICH GIVES US WARMTH IN WINTER AND CONTINUOUS HOT WATER.MANY ITEMS IN OUR HOUSE ARE POWERED BY ELECTRICITY.MY DIET IS MAINLY WHOLEFOODS, FRUIT, VEGETABLES AND SALADS.I EAT VERY LITTLE MEAT.WEEKENDS ARE USUALLY VERY BUSY.WE DO THE SHOPPING,GO OUT,VISIT FRIENDS,AND GO TO CHURCH ON SUNDAYS.MY HOBBIES CONSIST OF MODEL MAKING,COLLECTING STAMPS,CYCLING AND SWIMMING.
